title: Ball at the Wall: Interview w/Sam Coleman (Young Hodor) (video)
description: We attended Ball at the Wall (A Game of Thrones Masquerade Ball) at the Gaylord Opryland on October 26th, 2019, and had the opportunity to interview Sam Coleman - Young Hodor! Video available on Spotify. Published November 19, 2019.
dc:creator: History of Westeros
